definition[0]: used to say that you really like something or think that something is very good
example[0]: There’s nothing better than beating someone who’s playing well.
example[1]: She likes nothing better than a nice long walk along the beach.
definition[1]: used to say that a thing or situation is not very good, but is the only thing possible or available
example[2]: I only picked it up because there was nothing better to read.
example[3]: Have you got nothing better to do than sit there playing that silly game?
